messages.title: Katy Gordon's contract with Glasgow North
messages.content: I will put local people first. I will be there to help, listen to you, and stand up for our communities. I will be a strong voice for Glasgow North. I will: hold regular surgeries in easily accessible places, work with you year-round to make a real difference, make sure Westminster is heard locally and your voice is heard at Westminster, be a visible presence in the constituency, monitor health and social service provision, be regularly in schools and colleges and push for proper funding, be open and honest about all expenses incurred in representing you, publish details on my personal property, ask tough questions, put professionalism ahead of expenses or self-promotion, pay taxes in the UK.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Katy has a strong record of action in Glasgow North, winning back over 15,000 hours for the Save St. Augustine's Primary School and Saving the Otago Lane campaign.

mentions.tacticalSituation: With the Conservatives and the SNP out of the race, the choice is between Katy Gordon and the Labour MP who has let us down.

issues.education: Campaigned with parents against school closures in Wyndford and Cadder.

housing.content: Fought to save two Post Offices in Kelvindale and Hyndland.

leaflet.personalStatement: As your local MP, Katy Gordon will put first and deliver real change and fairness for our area.

politicalExperience.achievements: Winning back over 15,000 hours for the Save St. Augustine's Primary School and Saving the Otago Lane campaign.

contactInformation.address: Liberal Democrats, 4 Clifton Terrace, Edinburgh, EH12 5DR

endorsements.endorsement: Katy will fight for us all year round not just at election time. She is by far the best candidate.

quotes.text: 'Liberal Democrat MPs were more highly regarded by their constituents than Conservative or Labour MPs.'

images.caption: Katy Gordon pictured with campaign supporters for the Save St. Augustine's Primary School and the Save Otago Lane campaign.
Leaflet images showing Katy Gordon engaging with constituents and participating in community activities.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Katy's campaign is focused on local action and community involvement, highlighting her efforts in education and postal services, with an emphasis on accessibility and accountability to constituents.
